body: If I have four lands out, that can produce multiple colors of mana, and play a 4 mana spell, the game makes me specify how I pay the first colored mana, then chooses the other 3 for me. It should be able to see that any ways of paying the mana result in all 4 lands being tapped.
author: [georgeru...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115988881252246409393/)
title: If there is only one way to pay mana, don't force user to choose

comments.body:
Thank you for the report.

I can reproduce this using the following setup:
- have 2 x "Rupture Spire" (any color) and 1 x "Arcane Sanctum" (W/U/B)
- cast "Death Baron" (1BB)
* game makes you choose a land

It would be better if the code checks if mana cost equals mana available.

**Status:** Accepted

content:
_From [georgeru...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115988881252246409393/) on January 21, 2012 12:41:57_

If I have four lands out, that can produce multiple colors of mana, and play a 4 mana spell, the game makes me specify how I pay the first colored mana, then chooses the other 3 for me. It should be able to see that any ways of paying the mana result in all 4 lands being tapped.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=143_
